content:
I think the most challenging part of post-processing for me right now is probably color grading and color management. I've been having trouble getting the colors to look consistent across different images, and I'm not sure how to achieve a specific look or mood through color grading. I've been experimenting with different presets and color profiles, but I'm not entirely sure what I'm doing.

I've also been struggling with noise reduction and sharpening. I've been shooting in RAW, but I'm not sure how to effectively reduce noise without losing detail, and I'm worried that over-sharpening will make my images look unnatural.

Do you have any tips or resources for color grading and color management, as well as noise reduction and sharpening?
